Item.Value: [Text:Something about the old harp calls to you. Idly, you strum your fingers along the strings, and a soft series of notes echoes through the long deserted Manor.]

[Text:! You've come home! Master! Oh, I had begun to think this day would never come. The Manor has a master again at last! I'm $Name$,the spirit of the manor, and it is my utmost pleasure to have one of your line to serve once more!]
